

```{r}
#| label: geometric-demo
#| fig-align: center
library(ggplot2)
k <- seq(0, 8)
prob <- dgeom(k, 0.5)
bar_data <- tibble(k, prob)
ggplot(bar_data, aes(x = k, y = prob)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = cbPalette[1]) +
    labs(
        title = "Geometric Distribution, p = 0.5",
        y = "Probability Mass"
    ) +
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 8)) +
    dsan_theme("half")
```
